app.name: Busmoov
app.description: Compare quotes from the best carriers

hero.subtitle: Compare up to 3 personalised quotes from our partner coach operators. Simple, fast booking at the best price guaranteed.

features.title: Why choose Busmoov?
features.subtitle: The simplest and most reliable solution for your group travel

partners.title: +500 Coach Operators
partners.description: A network of certified partners throughout France to meet all your requirements.

response.title: Response within 24h

price.title: Best prices
price.description: Compare and choose the offer that best fits your budget.

secure.title: 100% Secure
secure.description: All our partners are verified, insured and compliant with regulations.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Get your quotes in 3 simple steps

step1.title: Describe your project
step1.description: Fill in the form with your trip details: dates, itinerary, number of passengers.

step2.title: Receive 3 quotes
step2.description: Our partner coach operators send you their best offers within 24 hours.

step3.title: Book and travel
step3.description: Choose the offer that suits you and set off with peace of mind!

testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of satisfied customers throughout France

quoteForm.circuitDetailsPlaceholder:
Describe the day-by-day programme, stops, approximate times...

Day 1: Departure London 8am → Visit Windsor Castle → Overnight in Oxford
Day 2: Oxford → Stratford-upon-Avon with stop in Cotswolds
Day 3: Stratford → Return to London
quoteForm.circuitDetailsHelp: The more detail you provide, the more accurate the quotes will be.
quoteForm.needVehicle: Once you arrive at your destination, will you need to use the vehicle?
quoteForm.needVehicleHelp: The driver will drop you at your destination and return to pick you up. The vehicle will not remain on site.
quoteForm.etapes: Stops, breaks, details about your trip
quoteForm.etapesHelp: If your journey involves multiple stops, please indicate the stops you want, stop durations, meal breaks, distances... The more precise the details, the more accurate the quotes.
quoteForm.etapesPlaceholder: Do not include personal information (email, phone, name, surname...)

quoteForm.advisorsHelp: To help you plan your trip and finalise your booking.

infosVoyage.howItWorksDescription: On the left, you see your validated quote information. On the right, you can specify exact addresses and add comments. Once validated, this information will be sent to the carrier for the roadmap.

Describe the day-by-day programme, stops, approximate times...

infosVoyage.commentsHint: Enter any useful information for the driver: precise meeting point, special instructions, accessibility, etc.

busRental.title: Coach hire
busRental.description: Need a coach for your group? Busmoov connects you with over 500 certified partner coach operators. Receive up to 3 personalised quotes in less than 24 hours and travel with peace of mind.
busRental.fleetSubtitle: From minibus to Grand Touring coach, find the vehicle suited to your group from 8 to 94 passengers
busRental.minibusDesc: Ideal for small groups, family excursions or VIP transfers.
busRental.standardDesc: Perfect for school trips, association outings and business travel.
busRental.grandTourismeDesc: Premium comfort for long journeys, tourist circuits and group travel.
busRental.doubleEtageDesc: Economical solution for very large groups and major events.
busRental.equipmentSubtitle: Our Grand Touring coaches are equipped to offer you a pleasant journey
busRental.occasionsSubtitle: Coach hire adapted to all types of events and travel
busRental.privateEventsList: Weddings, Birthdays, Family gatherings, Friends' reunions
busRental.businessEventsList: Corporate seminars, Team building, Conferences, Trade shows and conventions
busRental.leisureList: Tourist circuits, Theme parks, Sporting events, Concerts and festivals
busRental.schoolList: Educational outings, School trips, Outdoor education, Sports competitions
busRental.associationsList: Association trips, Pilgrimages, Hiking, Sports matches
busRental.transfersList: Airports, Railway stations, Hotels, Event shuttles
busRental.coverageSubtitle: Our network of over 500 coach operators covers the entire country and Europe
busRental.whyChooseTitle: Why choose Busmoov for your coach hire?
busRental.quoteIn24hDesc: Receive up to 3 proposals from our partner coach operators quickly.
busRental.verifiedCarriersDesc: All our partners are certified, insured and comply with safety standards.
busRental.proDriversDesc: Experienced, punctual drivers dedicated to your comfort.
busRental.bestPriceDesc: Compare offers and choose the one that fits your budget.
busRental.included4: Fuel and tolls included on quote
busRental.included6: Customer service available 7 days a week
busRental.ctaSubtitle: Receive up to 3 personalised proposals from our partner coach operators in less than 24h

minibusRental.title: Minibus hire
minibusRental.description: The ideal solution for your small groups! Our minibuses with professional driver are perfect for your business travel, VIP transfers, family excursions or private events.
minibusRental.advantagesTitle: The advantages of minibus with driver
minibusRental.advantagesSubtitle: A flexible, comfortable and economical transport solution for your small groups
minibusRental.advantage1Desc: From 8 to 25 passengers according to your needs, ideal for small groups without paying for a large coach.
minibusRental.advantage2Desc: Compact vehicle allowing access to city centres, narrow streets and limited parking.
minibusRental.advantage3Desc: Air conditioning, comfortable seats and generous luggage space for a pleasant journey.
minibusRental.advantage4Desc: Personalised schedules, bespoke itineraries and stops according to your needs.
minibusRental.capacitySubtitle: Choose the minibus suited to the size of your group
minibusRental.mini8Desc: The most compact in our fleet, perfect for VIP transfers and small groups.
minibusRental.mini12Desc: The perfect balance between capacity and manoeuvrability for your medium groups.
minibusRental.mini20Desc: Our largest minibus, ideal for groups who want to stay together.
minibusRental.occasionsTitle: For what occasions to hire a minibus?
minibusRental.occasionsSubtitle: Minibus with driver adapts to all your transport needs
minibusRental.pricingSubtitle: Competitive prices adapted to your project. Request a personalised quote for an exact price.
minibusRental.pricingNote: * Indicative prices may vary according to season, distance and availability. Request a quote for an exact price.
minibusRental.whyTitle: Why hire your minibus with Busmoov?
minibusRental.why1Desc: Receive up to 3 personalised quotes in less than 24 hours.
minibusRental.why2Desc: All our coach operators are verified, insured and comply with standards.
minibusRental.why3Desc: Personalised itineraries, flexible schedules and dedicated support.
minibusRental.why4Desc: Courteous, punctual professionals who know their region perfectly.
minibusRental.ctaSubtitle: Describe your project and receive up to 3 free quotes from our partners in less than 24h

airportTransfer.title: Airport transfer
airportTransfer.description: Private shuttle service 24/7 to all airports and railway stations in France. Guaranteed punctuality, real-time flight tracking and personalised welcome for your groups.
airportTransfer.advantagesSubtitle: A premium service for your travel to airports and railway stations
airportTransfer.advantage1Desc: Transfer service available at any time, 7 days a week, to suit your flight times.
airportTransfer.advantage2Desc: We track your flight in real time and adjust pick-up time in case of delay.
airportTransfer.advantage3Desc: Systematic early arrival to ensure you never miss your flight.
airportTransfer.advantage4Desc: From minibus to coach, solutions for all groups.
airportTransfer.airportsSubtitle: Transfers to and from all major airports and railway stations
airportTransfer.typesSubtitle: Solutions adapted to all your transport needs
airportTransfer.typeProDesc: For your colleagues, clients or partners. VIP welcome with name board, luggage assistance.
airportTransfer.typeGroupDesc: Ideal for tourist groups, seminars or events. Complete logistical coordination.
airportTransfer.typeEventDesc: Shuttle service for conferences, trade shows, weddings. Rotations according to your needs.
airportTransfer.step1Desc: Enter your information: airport, date, flight time, number of passengers.
airportTransfer.step2Desc: Compare up to 3 proposals from our partners within 24h.
airportTransfer.step3Desc: Choose the offer that suits you and pay online securely.
airportTransfer.step4Desc: Your driver awaits you at the agreed time with a name board.
airportTransfer.fleetSubtitle: Vehicles adapted to the size of your group
airportTransfer.pricingNote: * Indicative prices for a simple transfer. Exact price on quote according to distance and options.
airportTransfer.includedSubtitle: A complete service for a stress-free journey to the airport or station.
airportTransfer.option4Desc: Personalised welcome service in arrivals area
airportTransfer.ctaSubtitle: Service available 24/7 to all airports and railway stations

schoolTrips.title: Coach hire for
schoolTrips.description: Organise your school trips, discovery classes and educational journeys with peace of mind. Our partner coach operators specialise in transporting children and comply with all safety standards.
schoolTrips.safetySubtitle: Transporting your pupils safely is our absolute priority
schoolTrips.safety1Desc: Recent coaches, regularly inspected and compliant with school transport standards.
schoolTrips.safety2Desc: All our partners hold the necessary approvals for transporting children.
schoolTrips.safety3Desc: Experienced drivers specifically trained in transporting school groups.
schoolTrips.safety4Desc: All-risks cover adapted to school and extracurricular transport.
schoolTrips.tripsSubtitle: From day trips to multi-day journeys, we have the adapted solution
schoolTrips.trip1Desc: Visits to museums, historical sites, exhibitions and cultural venues.
schoolTrips.trip2Desc: Countryside classes, seaside classes, ski trips and nature stays.
schoolTrips.trip2Examples: Countryside classes, Seaside classes, Ski trips, Educational farms
schoolTrips.trip3Desc: End-of-year trips, language exchanges and trips abroad.
schoolTrips.trip3Examples: Trips in France, Stays in Europe, School exchanges, Language trips
schoolTrips.trip4Desc: School sports competitions, inter-school meetings and sports camps.
schoolTrips.trip4Examples: School sports competitions, Matches, Sports camps, Outdoor activities
schoolTrips.trip5Desc: Theme parks, wildlife parks and leisure centres.
schoolTrips.trip5Examples: Disneyland Paris, Parc Asterix, Puy du Fou, Zoos and aquariums
schoolTrips.trip6Desc: Theatre, cinema, educational concerts and shows.
schoolTrips.vehiclesSubtitle: From minibus for one class to grand touring coach for several classes
schoolTrips.vehicle1Ideal: Ideal for a nursery or primary class
schoolTrips.vehicle1Features: Seat belts, Air conditioning, Chaperone seats
schoolTrips.vehicle2Ideal: Perfect for one to two classes
schoolTrips.vehicle2Features: Luggage hold, Air conditioning, Reclining seats, Microphone
schoolTrips.vehicle3Features: High comfort, Toilet, Wi-Fi, Video screens, Large hold
schoolTrips.destinationsSubtitle: Our coach operators know these destinations and their access perfectly
schoolTrips.destParksList: Disneyland Paris, Parc Asterix, Puy du Fou, Futuroscope, Nigloland
schoolTrips.destCultureList: Louvre, Cite des Sciences, Natural History Museum, Palace of Versailles
schoolTrips.destNatureList: Beauval Zoo, Nausicaa, Thoiry Park, La Rochelle Aquarium
schoolTrips.destHistoryList: D-Day Beaches, Loire Castles, Mont Saint-Michel, Carcassonne
schoolTrips.howItWorksTitle: How to organise your school trip?
schoolTrips.howItWorksSubtitle: A simple process for educational establishments
schoolTrips.step1Desc: Indicate the number of pupils, destination, dates and desired times.
schoolTrips.step2Desc: Compare up to 3 detailed proposals from our partner coach operators.
schoolTrips.step3Desc: Choose the offer suited to your budget and confirm the booking.
schoolTrips.step4Desc: Receive the driver's contact details and enjoy your trip safely.
schoolTrips.docsSubtitle: We make the administrative procedures for school transport easier for you.
schoolTrips.doc1Desc: Complete document with all information required by the Education authorities.
schoolTrips.doc2Desc: Copy of the carrier's approvals and insurance.
schoolTrips.doc3Desc: Characteristics and safety equipment of the coach.
schoolTrips.doc4Desc: Compliant document for processing by the establishment's accounts department.
schoolTrips.included5: Assistance in case of unforeseen events
schoolTrips.testimonial1Text: Impeccable organisation for our end-of-year trip to Disneyland. The driver was punctual and very professional with the children.
schoolTrips.testimonial2Text: We use Busmoov for all our school sports trips. Always competitive prices and drivers who understand the constraints of sports competitions.
schoolTrips.testimonial3Text: The seaside class went perfectly. The carrier was used to long journeys with children. I highly recommend.
schoolTrips.ctaSubtitle: Request a free quote and receive up to 3 proposals from approved carriers

recapitulatif.prevoyanceDescription: Book with peace of mind with our serenity contract. Benefit from cancellation* up to 14 days before departure with no reason required.

about.title: About Busmoov
about.heroText: Busmoov is a brand of the Centrale Autocar group, the French leader in connecting travellers with coach operators. For over 5 years, we have been facilitating the organisation of your group travel throughout France and Europe.
about.storyP1: Founded in 2019, Busmoov was born from a simple observation: booking a coach for a group was often complicated, time-consuming and opaque.
about.storyP2: Our mission: to simplify coach hire by connecting travellers with a network of over 500 certified partner carriers throughout France.
about.storyP3: Today, Busmoov supports thousands of clients every year: businesses, associations, schools, travel agencies and private individuals.
about.valueReliabilityDesc: Rigorously selected and checked carriers to guarantee your safety.
about.valueServiceDesc: A dedicated team available 6 days a week to support you before, during and after your trip.
about.valueQualityDesc: Recent, comfortable and perfectly maintained vehicles for a pleasant journey.
about.valueExpertiseDesc: Over 5 years of experience in passenger transport by coach.
about.ctaSubtitle: Get a free quote in minutes and discover the Busmoov quality.

partner.title: Join the Busmoov network
partner.heroText: Become a partner and benefit from a constant flow of qualified requests to grow your business.
partner.benefit1Desc: Access a constant flow of qualified requests without commercial effort.
partner.benefit2Desc: We pre-qualify all requests to save you time.
partner.benefit3Desc: Guaranteed payment within 30 days after the service.
partner.benefit4Desc: A dedicated interface to manage your availability and bookings.
partner.formSubtitle: Fill in the form below and our team will contact you shortly.
partner.consent: By submitting this form, you agree to be contacted by our sales team. Your data is processed in accordance with our
partner.successMessage: Thank you for your interest. Our team will contact you shortly to discuss our partnership.
